title: FileNotFoundError when running X-validation in maDLC

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
**My operating system:**
OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b7
Anaconda env used: supplied DLC-GPU

**Problem:**
I am trying to run the cross-validation step in maDLC, and I keep receiving a FileNotFoundError. This occurs whether I try to run it on the GUI or in jupyter notebook by calling deeplabcut.evaluate_multianimal_crossvalidate. 

After both instances, I checked the folder the error referenced and the entire project file and could not find the .pickle file. Is there a way to fix this error and run cross-validation?

**Jupyter notebook code:**
`deeplabcut.evaluate_multianimal_crossvalidate(config_path, Shuffles=[1], edgewisecondition=True, leastbpts=1, init_points=20, n_iter=50, target='rpck_train')`

Terminal output:
```
C:\Users\winshah\Desktop\sniff+mate_trial2-Adarsh Tantry-2020-08-21\evaluation-results\iteration-0\sniff+mate_trial2Aug21-trainset95shuffle1  already exists!
C:\Users\winshah\Desktop\sniff+mate_trial2-Adarsh Tantry-2020-08-21\evaluation-results\iteration-0\sniff+mate_trial2Aug21-trainset95shuffle1\DLC_resnet50_sniff+mate_trial2Aug21shuffle1_50000-snapshot-50000.h5
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
FileNotFoundError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-6-0e56830f50cf> in <module>
----> 1 deeplabcut.evaluate_multianimal_crossvalidate(path_config_file, Shuffles=[1], edgewisecondition=True, leastbpts=2, init_points=10, n_iter=50, target='rpck_train')

~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\evaluate_multianimal.py in evaluate_multianimal_crossvalidate(config, Shuffles, trainingsetindex, pbounds, edgewisecondition, target, inferencecfg, init_points, n_iter, dcorr, leastbpts, printingintermediatevalues, modelprefix, plotting)
    561             dcorr=dcorr,
    562             leastbpts=leastbpts,
--> 563             modelprefix=modelprefix,
    564         )
    565 

~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\crossvalutils.py in bayesian_search(config_path, inferencecfg, pbounds, edgewisecondition, shuffle, trainingsetindex, modelprefix, snapshotindex, target, maximize, init_points, n_iter, acq, log_file, dcorr, leastbpts, printingintermediatevalues)
    333     )
    334     predictionsfn = fns[snapshotindex]
--> 335     data, metadata = auxfun_multianimal.LoadFullMultiAnimalData(predictionsfn)
    336     params = set_up_evaluation(data)
    337     columns = ["train_iter", "train_frac", "shuffle"]

~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxfun_multianimal.py in LoadFullMultiAnimalData(dataname)
    106 def LoadFullMultiAnimalData(dataname):
    107     """ Save predicted data as h5 file and metadata as pickle file; created by predict_videos.py """
--> 108     with open(dataname.split(".h5")[0] + "_full.pickle", "rb") as handle:
    109         data = pickle.load(handle)
    110     with open(dataname.split(".h5")[0] + "_meta.pickle", "rb") as handle:

FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'C:\\Users\\winshah\\Desktop\\sniff+mate_trial2-Adarsh Tantry-2020-08-21\\evaluation-results\\iteration-0\\sniff+mate_trial2Aug21-trainset95shuffle1\\DLC_resnet50_sniff+mate_trial2Aug21shuffle1_50000-snapshot-50000_full.pickle'

```
